page.title: 11Transport (cont.1)
page.content: The transport that we have for St.Lucia's C.E School, Upton Magna, are two mini buses.One picks up 9 children from Berwick Wharf, Uffington,Downton Cottages and it brings them to schoolat 8.50 am.The other bus pick up 10 children from Smethcote, Doncott,Acham and Wroxeter and it brings them to school at 9.15 am.The buses belong to Shropshire Education Comitee.The colourof the one bus iscream and white and the other one is white. Harlescott Bus _________________ There is a bus that comes and picks up the children that go to Harlecott Secondry School.It is green and cream.It picks up the chrildren from Upton Magna at 8.30amand they get to school at 9.00am then it picks them up from school at 3.00pm and it drops
